ygData.subject: Re: Too many off-topic posts... (ooc, long)
ygData.msgSnippet: There is no power guild on E ci.  I am still toying with the thought of starting one, although from reading on this list how much people hate them, I m taking
ygData.messageBody:
There is no power guild on E'ci. I am still toying with the thought
of starting one, although from reading on this list how much people
hate them, I'm taking a second look at it.

> Everyone has opinions.
>
> Every server is being aflicted by a power guild(s) taking over the
> things that 90% of the rest of the server would like to do. This
> in every way affects Bards... and Enchanters, and Warriors, and etc.
> In the past this list has proposed solutions to non-bard questions,
> thus is the nature of the list to investigate and solve problems.
> I can guarentee that this list distributes more in-game mechanics
> than any of list out there. But more than that, it distributes
> a fun and cheerful attitude. As bards, we know a little bit about
> everything, justly so.
>

Indeed, I believe I started this whole mess by asking this list for
advice on how to split dragon loot. I did this because I also think
the people of this list to be some of the most knowledgeable people
out there.

But it is off-topic, maybe we need to start a new list, ... after all,
I haven't played my bard in weeks, but I keep posting because
of the quality of this list.
